description: The Beer Belly Journeyman t-shirt says it all, no apologies given. And none needed, because you can do you all day long thanks this lightweight, breathable, versatile blend of organic cotton and recycled poly. Bonus: you're doing the planet a solid because this men's tee was made in a Fair Trade Certified™ Factory, which means the people who made it received an additional premium for their work.
name: Prana Beer Belly Journeyman T-Shirt - Mens
